Author: TonyL#3577
Content: Current Dice CC can't return random value in given diapason, it returns Win or Loss with given probability for Win

Author: TonyL#3577
Content: Actually I think "Dice" name for this CC quite confusing - since people starting to imagine the usual dice where you getting a random number in range after throw, but this CC provide only result - kinda "GambleCC". Actually a lot of games possible to make but with pseudo RNG on already known result GUI representation part (I've posted example of such implementation in #cc-dice - same way possible to make blackjack and other games) what players might don't like. On current contract only possible to build a game which provides RPC calls of contract (gamble bet with odds)

Author: Meyse#0952
Content: How do you mean "what players might not like"? If the GUI is good the players won't even notice that the result has been given already and the GUI just is a representation of that.

Author: TonyL#3577
Content: I mean that player might not like that blockchain returned "won" but he see "5" or "6" instead. If you're playing usual dice game your result is a number from 1 to 6 (each one you can get with probability 1/6) but DiceCC can't return numbers - it can return only won or lose with given probability

Author: Meyse#0952
Content:
Ah right, but I don't think it matters, cause the player won't see the difference anyway. You can present the player a number, even though the blockchain just says "won". The player probably won't even care, or even know about this, as long as it's all fair. 
This can be done with all games, roulette, slot machines, whatever

Author: TonyL#3577
Content:
Let's say you want to make blackjack. There are 52 cards in deck. You need to draw one. 
Probability 1/52 so you placing a bet do diceCC with odds 51 (1:52). You get a result "won" - which card you'll show to player?

Author: TonyL#3577
Content: Or you want to roll dice: dice have 6 numbers. You placing a bet with odds 1:6 and get result "loss"

Author: TonyL#3577
Content: Which number you will show to player?

Author: Meyse#0952
Content: Im not great with the rules of gambling games. But roulette should be easy

Author: Meyse#0952
Content: It doesn't matter which number you show, as long as it's the one that the player didn't bet on, your dice example

Author: Meyse#0952
Content: For me it's easy, for the user it doesn't matter what you show exactly. If the blockchain says "loss", you just let the GUI pick a random number that's not the winner

Author: TonyL#3577
Content: Best implementation of roulette which I can imagine on it will be very boring - player will be supposed to bet on one result only (number, colour,  dozen or something else) and no multiplayer is possible

Author: Meyse#0952
Content: I thought about the logic, you can do multiple bets

Author: TonyL#3577
Content: Since if you put multiply bets which have only won or loss results it's possible that conflicting outcomes will happen

Author: Meyse#0952
Content: No, conflicting outcomes won't be possible, you just let the GUI pick the number the ball will roll into, based on what the blockchain says how the bets went

Author: TonyL#3577
Content: I place bet 1 coin on number 5 and place bet 100 coins on number 6 - both numbers have same probability to come 1/38. You placing bet to CC 1:38 and getting result "won"

Author: Meyse#0952
Content: Oh wow didn't think about that lol, then you can only do 1 unique number maybe. Roulette has many options

Author: TonyL#3577
Content: And on some point diceCC RNG sense missing at all and you can use "traditional" RNG which you want to put into GUI and use blockchain only for payments

Author: TonyL#3577
Content: If you playing roulette all you want on spin is random number from 1 to 38, not won or lose - thats why I think for other games other CC needed

Author: Meyse#0952
Content: You can do red,black,even,uneven,and other number things

Author: TonyL#3577
Content:
Yeah - such things are possible - where no need exact thing like a number 5 or Jack of spades card to evaluate other bets/things.
Btw odds 1:2 not working correct atm and disabled ðŸ˜ƒ
